title: Anyone who gave this film less than 8 put of 10 shouldn't ge writing reviews!
review: A complete masterpiece from beginning to end....fantastic visual effects and a true work of art....it maybe a slow burner of a film...but definitely worth the persisting with ..if you want a fast paced marvel film, this isn't for you....but if you like a film that you need to think about and is thought provoking then this is fantastic....
